languages.text: "Знаешь, ты прав. Я бы тоже с радостью перестрелял{mf||а} каждого второго. Слабые, трусливые черви в человеческой коже".
"You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, ты прав. Я бы тоже с радостью перестрелял{mf||а} каждого второго. Слабые, трусливые черви в человеческой коже".

traits.locale_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."
"You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."
"You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."
"You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."
"You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

languages.text: 「実を言えば、君の言うとおりだ。出会った人間の半分を喜んで撃ち殺してやりたいと思っている。奴らは弱く、臆病な、人間の皮をかぶった虫けらどもだ」
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: 「実を言えば、君の言うとおりだ。出会った人間の半分を喜んで撃ち殺してやりたいと思っている。奴らは弱く、臆病な、人間の皮をかぶった虫けらどもだ」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, was? Ihr habt recht. Ich würde gerne die Hälfte der Leute erschießen, denen ich begegne. Schwache, feige Würmer in Menschenhaut."
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, was? Ihr habt recht. Ich würde gerne die Hälfte der Leute erschießen, denen ich begegne. Schwache, feige Würmer in Menschenhaut."

languages.text: « Vous savez quoi ? Vous avez raison. J'aimerais beaucoup pouvoir éliminer la moitié des gens qui croisent ma route. Tous ces misérables insectes déguisés en humains. »
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez quoi ? Vous avez raison. J'aimerais beaucoup pouvoir éliminer la moitié des gens qui croisent ma route. Tous ces misérables insectes déguisés en humains. »

languages.text: «¿Sabe qué le digo? Que tiene razón. Si por mí fuera, mandaría fusilar a la mitad de las personas con las que trato. Son unos gusanos débiles y cobardes que se hacen pasar por humanos».
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe qué le digo? Que tiene razón. Si por mí fuera, mandaría fusilar a la mitad de las personas con las que trato. Son unos gusanos débiles y cobardes que se hacen pasar por humanos».

languages.text: “你知道吗？我觉得你说得对。我也很想见到谁杀谁，杀光那些披着人皮的废物、蛆虫。”
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: “你知道吗？我觉得你说得对。我也很想见到谁杀谁，杀光那些披着人皮的废物、蛆虫。”

languages.text: "Aslında... Doğru. Karşıma çıkan insanların yarısını hiç çekinmeden vururdum. İnsan görünümlü zayıf ve ödlek solucanlardan ibaretler."
languages.original_text: "You know something? You're right. I would gladly shoot half the people I encounter. Weak, cowardly worms in human skin."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyor musun? Haklısın. Karşıma çıkan insanların yarısını hiç çekinmeden vururdum. İnsan görünümlü zayıf ve ödlek solucanlardan ibaretler."
